channel.title: NPC Drops
channel.description:
Okay... I need help changing what my NPC's drop.
So.. I open npcdrops.cfg and it looks like this: [code]//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 1 1 995 3 995 4 995 5 995 6 995 7 995 8 995 9 995 10 995 11 995 12 995 13 995 14 995 15 526 1 npcdrop = 3 1 995 3 995 4 995 5 995 6 995 7 995 8 995 9 995 10 995 11 995 12 995 13 995 14 995 15 npcdrop = 3 2 1203 1 882 7 877 1 877 2 877 3 npcdrop = 3 3 1139 1 1137 1 npcdrop = 3 4 557 4 563 1 565 1 554 6 562 2 558 9 npcdrop = 3 5 199 1 1061 1 313 1 1440 1 1446 1 438 1 436 1 1965 1 2677 1 npcdrop = 7 1 995 3 995 4 995 5 995 6 995 7 995 8 995 9 995 10 995 11 995 12 995 13 995 14 995 15 npcdrop = 7 2 882 7 1203 1 npcdrop = 7 3 1139 1 npcdrop = 7 4 557 4 554 6 562 2 558 9 npcdrop = 7 5 436 1 2677 1 1440 1 313 1 5345 1 199 1 5341 1 5329 1 5318 1 5318 2 5318 3 5318 4 5320 1 5320 2 5324 1 5324 2 5324 3 5322 1 5322 2 5319 2 5319 3 5323 1 5343 1 5340 1 npcdrop = 9 4 995 3 995 4 995 5 995 10 995 28 526 1 npcdrop = 10 4 995 3 995 4 995 5 995 10 995 28 526 1 npcdrop = 86 4 526 1 npcdrop = 87 4 526 1[/code]
Now, the bottom 4 there are what I need help with really. ID 9/10 are gaurd ID's. I want them to drop the coins and bones that I have it set to. 86/87 are rats. I want them to drop the bones that I have set.
I compile.. no errors. I run server. Gaurd's don't drop anything, and the rats are dropping Guthix and other random items. Neither are dropping what I set there.
What I need help with: 1. What is DropType? Which numbers go with what? Yes, I have tried #'s 1-4 and none of them make the drops work. 2. How do I make my NPC's drop what I set? 3. Is there a way to make select NPC's drop one pile of bones EVERY time including whatever I have set in npcdrops.cfg?
Thanks, -Alexia

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Okay. I will try that tomorrow. I need to sleep before I die.

Gahh… this will take hours.

Oh well.

-Alexia | Thanks for the help. ++

Read full topic

@danieb wrote:

go inyo item2.java and make an array to include all items u want dropped load that array througha path into your npchandler a bit like mine but change ids

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Okay. I did your tutorial, but I still don’t understand how to do what I want to do.

Basically, I want all monsters to have crap drops, drop bones each time, and I want to know how to make those crap drops better for certain monsters (greaters drop rune large, jad drops fire capes and crystal keys, etc…).

I am trying to get my server close to Runescape, but be Runescape with benefits (quick teleports, faster experience, and a little bit faster to get better items).

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Okay… I need help changing what my NPC’s drop.

So… I open npcdrops.cfg and it looks like this:

//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 1 1 995 3 995 4 995 5 995 6 995 7 995 8 995 9 995 10 995 11 995 12 995 13 995 14 995 15 526 1 npcdrop = 3 1 995 3 995 4 995 5 995 6 995 7 995 8 995 9 995 10 995 11 995 12 995 13 995 14 995 15 npcdrop = 3 2 1203 1 882 7 877 1 877 2 877 3 npcdrop = 3 3 1139 1 1137 1 npcdrop = 3 4 557 4 563 1 565 1 554 6 562 2 558 9 npcdrop = 3 5 199 1 1061 1 313 1 1440 1 1446 1 438 1 436 1 1965 1 2677 1 npcdrop = 7 1 995 3 995 4 995 5 995 6 995 7 995 8 995 9 995 10 995 11 995 12 995 13 995 14 995 15 npcdrop = 7 2 882 7 1203 1 npcdrop = 7 3 1139 1 npcdrop = 7 4 557 4 554 6 562 2 558 9 npcdrop = 7 5 436 1 2677 1 1440 1 313 1 5345 1 199 1 5341 1 5329 1 5318 1 5318 2 5318 3 5318 4 5320 1 5320 2 5324 1 5324 2 5324 3 5322 1 5322 2 5319 2 5319 3 5323 1 5343 1 5340 1 npcdrop = 9 4 995 3 995 4 995 5 995 10 995 28 526 1 npcdrop = 10 4 995 3 995 4 995 5 995 10 995 28 526 1 npcdrop = 86 4 526 1 npcdrop = 87 4 526 1

Now, the bottom 4 there are what I need help with really. ID 9/10 are gaurd ID’s. I want them to drop the coins and bones that I have it set to. 86/87 are rats. I want them to drop the bones that I have set.

I compile… no errors. I run server. Gaurd’s don’t drop anything, and the rats are dropping Guthix and other random items. Neither are dropping what I set there.

What I need help with:

  1. What is DropType? Which numbers go with what? Yes, I have tried #'s 1-4 and none of them make the drops work.
  2. How do I make my NPC’s drop what I set?
  3. Is there a way to make select NPC’s drop one pile of bones EVERY time including whatever I have set in npcdrops.cfg?

Thanks,
-Alexia

Read full topic
